text: Romelu Menama Lukaku Bolingoli (; born 13 May 1993) is a Belgian professional footballer who plays as a striker for club Roma, on loan from club Chelsea, and the Belgium national team. Lukaku has played for professional clubs in Belgium, England, and Italy. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League
